solutions: Avoid overhead watering to reduce leaf wetness
leaf_spot.prevention: Plant resistant varieties when available. Space plants properly to allow good air circulation.

solutions: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate-based fungicides
Use milk spray (1 part milk to 9 parts water)
powdery_mildew.prevention: Plant in full sun. Avoid overcrowding plants. Water early in the day.

solutions: Apply fungicides containing myclobutanil or tebuconazole
rust.prevention: Remove nearby alternate host plants. Clean up plant debris in fall.

solutions: Remove and destroy infected plants immediately
Avoid working with plants when wet
blight.prevention: Use disease-free seed. Water at base of plants. Stake plants to improve air flow.

root_rot.prevention: Use well-draining soil. Avoid overwatering. Sterilize pots and tools between uses.
